amendment.description: Amendment ensures that businesses will not be penalized for inadvertent human error in preparation or variation of ingredients.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McMorris Rodgers amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 309 - 100, 1 Present (Roll no. 79).

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Mrs. McMorris Rodgers.
